job.name: SSH_Remote_Script_Execution
job.description: A workflow example that executes a script in a remote machine using SSH (via the sshpass utility)

script.code: echo "Script: $0" echo "Running on $(hostname)" echo "Date on the current system: `date`" echo "Exited" exit 0

# Get the SSH user and password to log into the remote machine sshUser=$variables_SSH_USR sshPassword=$variables_SSH_PWD sshHost=$variables_SSH_HOST sshPort=$variables_SSH_PORT
# Prepare the script to execute in the remote machine chmod a+x scripts/script.sh
# Printing the script echo "============== The script to be executed ==========================" cat scripts/script.sh echo "============================================================" echo "Executing the script remotely in the machine "$sshHost
if ! command -v sshpass &> /dev/null then echo "sshpass could not be found, using a sshpass docker container"
# copy the script to the remote machine docker run --rm -i -v $(pwd)/scripts:/scripts ictu/sshpass -p $sshPassword scp -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -P $sshPort /scripts/script.sh $sshUser@$sshHost:/tmp/script.sh
# execute the script in the remote machine docker run --rm -i -v $(pwd)/scripts:/scripts ictu/sshpass -p $sshPassword ssh -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no $sshUser@$sshHost -p $sshPort "/tmp/script.sh"
else echo "sshpass found"
# copy the script to the remote machine sshpass -p $sshPassword scp -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -P $sshPort scripts/script.sh $sshUser@$sshHost:/tmp/script.sh
# execute the script in the remote machine sshpass -p $sshPassword ssh -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no $sshUser@$sshHost -p $sshPort "/tmp/script.sh" fi
